name: WinHKI HKI1 Archive
summary: An HKI1 file is a compressed archive created by WinHKI, an archiving utility for Windows. It likely contains one or more media files, which have been compressed to reduce their file size. HKI1 files are similar to but compressed differently than .HKI2 and .HKI3 files.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
